disease: Malignant neoplasm of unspecified part of unspecified bronchus or lung

risk_factors: exposure to tobacco smoke in the perinatal period
occupational exposure to environmental tobacco smoke

required: Presence of malignant cells in the bronchus or lung tissue (confirmed by biopsy)
supportive: Imaging findings suggestive of a lung mass (e.g., CT scan, X-ray)
Clinical symptoms such as cough, hemoptysis, dyspnea, chest pain
